name: UpdatePromoRule
description:
Update a promotional rule in an e-commerce store.

Use this tool to modify details of an existing promotional rule in a specified e-commerce store. It should be called when you need to update the conditions or discounts associated with a promo rule.

parameters.name: store_identifier
parameters.description: Specify the unique identifier of the e-commerce store where the promo rule will be updated.

parameters.name: promo_rule_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the promotional rule within the store. This is required to specify which promo rule to update.

value_schema.description: The id for the promo rule of a store.

parameters.name: promo_rule_details
parameters.description: Details of the promo rule update, including title, description, start and end dates, type, target, amount, and enabled status. Expected as JSON.

title.description: The title that will show up in promotion campaign. Restricted to UTF-8 characters with max length of 100 bytes.

description.description: The description of a promotion restricted to UTF-8 characters with max length 255.

starts_at.description: The date and time when the promotion is in effect in ISO 8601 format.

ends_at.description: The date and time when the promotion ends. Must be after starts_at and in ISO 8601 format.

amount.description: The amount of the promo code discount. If 'type' is 'fixed', the amount is treated as a monetary value. If 'type' is 'percentage', amount must be a decimal value between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive.

type.description: Type of discount. For free shipping set type to fixed.

target.description: The target that the discount applies to.

enabled.description: Whether the promo rule is currently enabled.

created_at_foreign.description: The date and time the promotion was created in ISO 8601 format.

updated_at_foreign.description: The date and time the promotion was updated in ISO 8601 format.
